meanings.definition: In a manner that can be repeated or duplicated.
meanings.sent1: She followed the recipe reproducibly to make the same delicious cookies every time.
meanings.sent2: The experiment results were obtained reproducibly by following the exact steps.
meanings.sent3: He could dance reproducibly to the same song without missing a beat.
meanings.sent4: The magician's trick was performed so reproducibly that no one could figure out the secret.
meanings.sent5: The instructions were laid out reproducibly, making it easy for anyone to follow.

meanings.sent1: The scientist's findings were reproducibly confirmed by other researchers.
meanings.sent2: The machine produced reproducibly identical parts for the assembly line.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meow was so reproducibly loud that it woke up the entire household.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was reproducibly stunning, capturing the attention of all who saw it.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's performance was reproducibly exceptional, setting a new record each time.
